Note: the floor fade is where an image fades to black subtly at the bottom.
image blur is also very powerful. you can blur the whole image or an out of focus area.
putting the text in a box is an easy to make the text stand out, make the box opaque so you can see the image below.
be careful with the colors you use for image overlays
use gradients to help your mast images pop
use black overlays on images to help white text pop
